title: I'm Alienating My Daughter
description:
Jane knows that she can no longer be in control when it comes to her adult daughter, but she tries to tell her what to do anyway. - Dr. Laura: "Give advice only when you're asked."

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
